channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Windows

item.title: CVE-2017-8633|2024-09-17T00:36:25.288Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20windows
item.description: Windows Error Reporting (WER) in Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, 1703, and Windows Server 2016 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability, aka "Windows Error Reporting Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".

item.title: CVE-2017-0174|2024-09-17T04:25:32.496Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20windows
item.description: Windows NetBIOS in Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, 1703, and Windows Server 2016 allows a denial of service vulnerability when it improperly handles NetBIOS packets, aka "Windows NetBIOS Denial of Service Vulnerability".
